question.title: How to add RestController or Service in Cas7.1.3
question.body:
At the beginning of using Cas7.1.3, I found that I couldn't add a custom RestController. I once attempted to specify a configuration class in "META-INF\spring\org.springframework.boot.autoconfiguration.Autoconfiguration.imports" and added RestController to the configuration class through @ ComponentScan, but it still did not take effect.

How to correctly add beans like @RestController and @Service.
